name: Lights Off
description:
The classic game inspired by Tiger Electronic's 'Lights Out' is back for the App Store and better than ever!

Lights Off is a simple game in which the goal is to turn all the lights off to progress to the next level. Featuring smooth animations, subtle sound effects and beautiful artwork, Lights Off is the perfect way to kill some time and see how far you can get.

Spiritual successor to the original Lights Off game by Lucas Newman and Adam Betts, 'Lights Off' is completely built from scratch with a brand new engine and more of Adam's great artwork.

Tap the LCD area to select level!
